General.Name: Winner Medical Co Ltd
General.Description: Winner Medical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of cotton-based medical dressings and medical disposables, and consumer products in China. It offers wound care products, including gauze, bandages, adhesive and film dressing, cotton and non-woven products, liquid skin protectants, debridement, exudate management, anti-adhesive wound care, scar repair, antimicrobial, collagen dressing, and compression treatment products, as well as wound care, dressing change, suture and remove, catheter, disinfection, anesthesia kits; and masks, gloves, protective apparel, disinfection products, surgical gowns and drapes, specialty drapes and packs, OR solution accessories, general surgical kits and trays, and pet care solutions. The company also provides adult diapers, incontinence nursing pads, cotton balls and swabs, foot care products, hand sanitizers, facial and lens cleansing wipes, sports care and hygiene products, wipes, and cosmetic and other cotton products. It provides its products under the Winner Medical, Purcotton, and PureH2B brands for hospitals, pharmacy, PPE, consumer, and industrial fields. Winner Medical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Winner Medical Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Winner Group Limited.
General.Address: Building No.2, Huilong Business Center, Shenzhen, China, 518131
